basics.name: Jericho Macabante
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii and expect to graduate in Spring, 2024. I love solving complex problems and crocheting.

volunteer.organization: University of Hawaii Rainbwo Warrior Marching Band
volunteer.summary: Lead low brass section throughout the season, acting as a medium of communication between the section and Music Directors.
highlights: Plan and lead all low brass sectionals
Brief and prepare section for upcoming events and performances

volunteer.summary: Train and manage data utilizing Dialogflow to produce automated Chatbot responses.
highlights: Assist with development of a website with an integrated Chatbot
Website depicted Office of Hawaiian Affairs, providing automated responses intended for public use

volunteer.summary: Lead team during practice to ensure proper Windows systems analysis, CISCO network diagnostics, and Linux systems analysis.
highlights: Developed core Cyber Security values, Windows 11/10/8 systems analysis skills, and CISCO networking skills

work.position: Information Technology and Software Development Intern
work.summary: Provides support in a shared services environment with the U.S. District Court.
highlights: Leveraged ReactJS to develop a comprehensive services page, showcasing pertinent information retrieved from a SQL relational database. This involved incorporating data from two distinct services offered by the office, delivering a cohesive and user-friendly interface
Designed and developed a specialized component enabling users to effortlessly download files via hyperlinks, enhancing the website's functionality and user experience
Developed a Microsoft Power Apps application for data management, leveraging SharePoint lists and advanced querying

work.summary: Work with Cyber Security Specialists, Navy partners, and University of Hawaii faculty to perform current and relevant Cyber Security research.
highlights: Identify weaknesses within current Artificial Intelligence applications in order to draft plans of defense

awards.title: Band Scholarship
awards.summary: Recognized for musical leadership and excellence.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction when they have earned a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher and were enrolled in 12 or more credits for a grade.
